text: Argentina national football team is the national football team of Argentina. They are nicknamed La Albiceleste (the blue and whites). == Most appearances == Boldface indicates a player still active Rank Player Caps Goals Career 1 Lionel Messi 191 112 2 Javier Mascherano 147 3 3 Ángel Di María 145 31 2008–2024 3 Javier Zanetti 145 5 1994–2011 5 Nicolás Otamendi 125 7 2009–present 6 Roberto Ayala 115 7 1994–2007 7 Diego Simeone 104 11 1988–2002 8 Sergio Agüero 101 41 2006–2021 9 Oscar Ruggeri 97 7 1983–1994 10 Sergio Romero 96 0 2009–2018 == Top scorers == Rank Player Goals Caps Ratio Career 1 Lionel Messi 112 191 2 Gabriel Batistuta 56 78 3 Sergio Agüero 41 101 2006–2021 4 Hernán Crespo 35 64 1995–2007 5 Diego Maradona 34 91 1977–1994 6 Lautaro Martínez 32 70 7 Gonzalo Higuaín 31 75 2009–2018 7 Ángel Di María 31 145 2008–2024 9 Luis Artime 24 25 1961–1967 10 Leopoldo Luque 22 45 1975–1981 10 Daniel Passarella 22 70 1976–1986 == References == ;Notes Category:South American national football teams Category:Football in Argentina Category:National sports teams of Argentina
